explain: to look for a long time
a person or thing who is brave
to do an activity to keep the body healthy
to fail to see or notice
the light of the sun; sunshine
a small flower with white petals and a yellow center
to let tears fall from your eyes because you are sad or hurt
a person whose job is to secretly watch others and collect information
statement: This rabbit is gazing, or looking closely, at a squirrel.
This man is a hero. He saved the boys from getting hurt.
A dog needs to exercise every day to stay healthy.
They overlooked, or didn't see, where the dog was hiding.
Spiders hunt and eat insects to get energy.
Most birds have the ability to fly.
I wake up when I see the morning sunlight in my room.
There is a daisy growing in the garden.
The puppy followed me all the way home.
The baby began to cry when she was hungry.
The spy hid behind the wall to listen to the conversation.
